actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain land acquired for flood-control purposes which is no longer needed for such purposes be disposed of as surplus property.

summary.text: Provides that land acquired for floodcontrol purposes which is no longer needed for such purposes be disposed of as surplus property, under the procedures of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain land acquired for flood-control purposes which is no longer needed for such purposes be disposed of as surplus property.
